content: Hi all, I've been around the Rust community for a little while (https://www.rustaceans.org/timClicks).. I'm the author of Rust in Action and have been live coding for a little bit recently. I'm hoping to contribute back to the language proper as I get time :)
hey Tim :slight_smile: good to see you here :slight_smile:
Hi @Tim McNamara! Nice to see you here!
Happy to be here :) Thanks for your Rust advocacy on LKML and other places @Josh Triplett

I'm trying to be careful in that context. In many ways, I think we'll get one shot at that in the short term, and if we screw it up we won't get another one for a long time if at all. I'm happy to encourage moving slowly and carefully, and fitting in well. :)
Hi Tim, I :heart: your book! Good to see you here.
